channel.title: Another fast question about PI
channel.description:
So i added 2 new bosses and i want to make a teleport to them
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2d91p1f.png[/img]
Like you can see the last ones. First there was just a Empty spot and i changed the name. If i click it now nothing happens.
How can i add a teleport to them? So that if you click it it teleports you to the coords i want?
Ty for helping

item.title: Another fast question about PI
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

it’s
c.getPA().startTeleport(3333,3333,0, “modern”);
or
c.getPA().movePlayer(3333,3333,0);

Read full topic

item.title: Another fast question about PI
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

PI:
blonde moment

c.getPA().startTeleport2(x,y,h);//h = height

I think it’s startteleport2, or moveplayer.???

EDIT:

or

something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Another fast question about PI
item.dc:creator: @rspscode rspscode
item.description:
@rspscode wrote:

client.getMovement().startTeleport(c, x, y, h, true);

What should i change the “c” and"h" to?

Read full topic

item.title: Another fast question about PI
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

no problem, my pleasure.

Read full topic

item.title: Another fast question about PI
item.dc:creator: @rspscode rspscode
item.description:
@rspscode wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:2, topic:527496”]1) Run server, run client.

  1. open the dialogue you added.

  2. close all windows (OR MINIMIZE) EXCEPT CLIENT AND SERVER

  3. Move client to the right or left, and cmd right or left.

  4. Click on the 2 bosses you added, and look at cmd the actionbutton or something.

  5. Open clickingbuttons.java

  6. Search: case : // = the actionutton or whatever on step 5.

  7. write this. Might have to convert it to yours.

[code=java]
if (client.dialogueAction = 1);// change to the sendoption5 dialogueaction you added.
client.GameDialogues().sendGameMessage(“You teleport to the boss, be prepared!”);
client.getMovement().startTeleport(c, x, y, h, true);
}

Hope I helped.[/code][/quote]
Trying it later
Tyvm for your time

Read full topic

item.title: Another fast question about PI
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

  1. Run server, run client.

  2. open the dialogue you added.

  3. close all windows (OR MINIMIZE) EXCEPT CLIENT AND SERVER

  4. Move client to the right or left, and cmd right or left.

  5. Click on the 2 bosses you added, and look at cmd the actionbutton or something.

  6. Open clickingbuttons.java

  7. Search: case : // = the actionutton or whatever on step 5.

  8. write this. Might have to convert it to yours.

[code=java]
if (client.dialogueAction = 1);// change to the sendoption5 dialogueaction you added.
client.GameDialogues().sendGameMessage(“You teleport to the boss, be prepared!”);
client.getMovement().startTeleport(c, x, y, h, true);
}

Hope I helped.[/code]

Read full topic
